thread.title: Dozens dead as a bus, lorry collide in France
thread.title_full: Dozens dead as a bus, lorry collide in France | News24

author: news24.com
title: Dozens dead as a bus, lorry collide in France
text:
Bordeaux - At least 39 people, most of them adults, were killed when a bus collided with a lorry in southwestern France early on Friday, a fire service official said.
He said 38 of the dead were passengers on the bus, while the other fatality was the driver of the lorry.
The two vehicles collided head-on near the town of Libourne.
